title: Hi, I got 5 mins low prior Q due to server lag.
body: To whom may concern. Im in Sydney, but recently I am experiencing serious lag in game. The ping and FPS are perfectly normal but animation constantly stuck. I couldn't even proply play. I tried DCn and RC several times to relieve the symptom but the system recognize me as AFK and gave me low prior Q for 5 matchmakings. Could you cancel that?

replies.body: Servers are probably messed up atm. Avoid playing for the moment.
